Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dgmjiToPHC3Yf5I3]{Acute Scent}, or precise or imprecise scent and@Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Low-Light Vision}.

Your senses gain even greater clarity. While raging, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision} if you donâ€™t already have it, and the range of your imprecise scent increases to 60 feet.

prerequisites.value: Acute Scent, or precise or imprecise scent and low-light vision
